scripts.shake: adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
scripts.ios:pod: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install
scripts.keystore:generate: cd android && cd app && keytool -genkeypair -v -keystore my-upload-key.keystore -alias my-key-alias -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000
scripts.debug:keystore: cd android && cd app && keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.release:keystore: cd android && cd app && keytool -exportcert -alias my-key-alias -keystore my-upload-key.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.SHA1:debug: cd android && cd app && keytool -exportcert -keystore debug.keystore -list -v
scripts.SHA1:release: cd android && cd app && keytool -exportcert -keystore my-upload-key.keystore -list -v
scripts.newclear: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf ios/build/* && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf ~/.rncache && yarn cache clean && yarn install && yarn fix-xcode && yarn copyFontToNodeModule && yarn ios:pod && yarn android:clean
